title: Pixel 3 Block Google
content: I bought it (Pixel 3 from Ebay, the seller did not warn, and sent me a blocked phone. They are listed in Google, because I’m just a user - I could not write them a message in the mail, can anyone come across such a problem? It’s impossible to use the phones, t .k. they are only for e-mail with the address *@google.com *
